summary: Natalie resorts to picking up the pieces of her life after her husband leaves her for the family he has outside. she falls in love with Darrell, but he has secrets of his own. Can Natalie handle any more secrets?
cast: Scarlett Estevez|Garcelle Beauvais|Lynn Whitfield|Greg Vaughan|Leon|Kate Nauta|Brian White|Trilby Glover|Jim Iyke|Lainey Lipson|Sahlima|Leonel Claude|Carrie Armstrong|Judy Clement|Paul Whetstone|Gabriel D. Angell|Anthony Omari|Gloria Huwiler|Ebbe Bassey|Jon Morgan Woodward|George Stumpf|Barbara Garabedian|Dennis Nicomede|Thomas Bell|Libertad Green|Barika A. Croom|William Mortensen Vaughan|Patrice Gibbs|Russell Becker|Christian O'Brien|Everett Stone Grant
title: Someone to Love
